## node




### setDebugMode

Enable additional logging by enabling debug mode

#### Parameters

-   `t` **Boolen** Debug mode value

### setProvider

Set a new default provider

#### Parameters

-   `provider` **[String][123]** The address of the provider
-   `isZeronet` **[Boolean][124]** Whether the provider is a zeronet node

### resetProvider

Reset the provider to the default provider

### query

Queries a node given a path and payload

#### Parameters

-   `path` **[String][123]** The RPC path to query
-   `payload` **[String][123]** The payload of the query
-   `method` **[String][123]** The request method. Either 'GET' or 'POST'

Returns **[Promise][125]** The response of the query

## rpc




### account

Originate a new account

#### Parameters

-   `paramObject` **[Object][126]** The parameters for the origination
    -   `paramObject.keys` **[Object][126]?** The keys for which to originate the account. If using a ledger, this is optional
    -   `paramObject.amount` **[Number][127]** The amount in tez to transfer for the initial balance
    -   `paramObject.spendable` **[Boolean][124]?** Whether the keyholder can spend the balance from the new account
    -   `paramObject.delegatable` **[Boolean][124]?** Whether the new account is delegatable
    -   `paramObject.delegate` **[String][123]?** The delegate for the new account
    -   `paramObject.fee` **[Number][127]** The fee to set for the transaction (optional, default `1278`)
    -   `paramObject.gasLimit` **[Number][127]** The gas limit to set for the transaction (optional, default `10000`)
    -   `paramObject.storageLimit` **[Number][127]** The storage limit to set for the transaction (optional, default `257`)
-   `ledgerObject` **[Object][126]** The ledger parameters for the operation (optional, default `{}`)
    -   `ledgerObject.useLedger` **[Boolean][124]** Whether to sign the transaction with a connected ledger device (optional, default `false`)
    -   `ledgerObject.path` **[String][123]** The ledger path (optional, default `44'/1729'/0'/0'`)
    -   `ledgerObject.curve` **[Number][127]** The value which defines the curve (0x00=tz1, 0x01=tz2, 0x02=tz3) (optional, default `0x00`)

Returns **[Promise][125]** Object containing the injected operation hash

### getBalance

Get the balance for an address

#### Parameters

-   `address` **[String][123]** The address for which to retrieve the balance

Returns **[Promise][125]** The balance of the address

### getDelegate

Get the delegate for an address

#### Parameters

-   `address` **[String][123]** The address for which to retrieve the delegate

Returns **[Promise][125]** The address of the delegate if a delegate is registered

### getHead

Get the current head block of the chain

Returns **[Promise][125]** The current head block

### getHeadHash

Get the current head block hash of the chain

Returns **[Promise][125]** The current head block hash

### call

Get the current head block hash of the chain

#### Parameters

-   `path` **[String][123]** The path to query
-   `payload` **[Object][126]** The payload of the request

Returns **[Promise][125]** The response of the rpc call

### sendOperation

Send an operation

#### Parameters

-   `paramObject` **[Object][126]** The parameters for the operation
    -   `paramObject.from` **[Object][126]** The address sending the operation
    -   `paramObject.operation` **([Object][126] \| [Array][128])** The operation to include in the transaction
    -   `paramObject.keys` **([Object][126] \| [Boolean][124])** The keys for which to originate the account (optional, default `false`)
    -   `paramObject.skipPrevalidation` **[Boolean][124]** Skip prevalidation before injecting operation (optional, default `false`)
-   `ledgerObject` **[Object][126]?** The ledger parameters for the operation (optional, default `{}`)
    -   `ledgerObject.useLedger` **[Boolean][124]** Whether to sign the transaction with a connected ledger device (optional, default `false`)
    -   `ledgerObject.path` **[String][123]** The ledger path (optional, default `44'/1729'/0'/0'`)
    -   `ledgerObject.curve` **[Number][127]** The value which defines the curve (0x00=tz1, 0x01=tz2, 0x02=tz3) (optional, default `0x00`)

Returns **[Promise][125]** Object containing the injected operation hash

### inject

Inject an operation

#### Parameters

-   `opOb` **[Object][126]** The operation object
-   `sopbytes` **[Object][126]** The signed operation bytes

Returns **[Promise][125]** Object containing the injected operation hash

### silentInject

Inject an operation without prevalidation

#### Parameters

-   `sopbytes` **[Object][126]** The signed operation bytes

Returns **[Promise][125]** Object containing the injected operation hash

### transfer

Transfer operation

#### Parameters

-   `paramObject` **[Object][126]** The parameters for the operation
    -   `paramObject.from` **[String][123]** The address sending the operation
    -   `paramObject.keys` **[Object][126]?** The keys for which to originate the account. If using a ledger, this is optional
    -   `paramObject.to` **[String][123]** The address of the recipient
    -   `paramObject.amount` **[Number][127]** The amount in tez to transfer for the initial balance
    -   `paramObject.fee` **[Number][127]** The fee to set for the transaction (optional, default `1278`)
    -   `paramObject.parameter` **[String][123]** The parameter for the transaction (optional, default `false`)
    -   `paramObject.gasLimit` **[Number][127]** The gas limit to set for the transaction (optional, default `10100`)
    -   `paramObject.storageLimit` **[Number][127]** The storage limit to set for the transaction (optional, default `0`)
    -   `paramObject.mutez` **[Number][127]** Whether the input amount is set to mutez (1/1,000,000 tez) (optional, default `false`)
    -   `paramObject.rawParam` **[Number][127]** Whether to accept the object parameter format (optional, default `false`)
-   `ledgerObject` **[Object][126]?** The ledger parameters for the operation (optional, default `{}`)
    -   `ledgerObject.useLedger` **[Boolean][124]** Whether to sign the transaction with a connected ledger device (optional, default `false`)
    -   `ledgerObject.path` **[String][123]** The ledger path (optional, default `44'/1729'/0'/0'`)
    -   `ledgerObject.curve` **[Number][127]** The value which defines the curve (0x00=tz1, 0x01=tz2, 0x02=tz3) (optional, default `0x00`)

Returns **[Promise][125]** Object containing the injected operation hash

### activate

Activate an account

#### Parameters

-   `keys` **[Object][126]** The keys containing the public key hash
-   `secret` **[String][123]** The secret to activate the account

Returns **[Promise][125]** Object containing the injected operation hash

### originate

Originate a new contract

#### Parameters

-   `paramObject` **[Object][126]** The parameters for the operation
    -   `paramObject.keys` **[Object][126]?** The keys for which to originate the account. If using a ledger, this is optional
    -   `paramObject.amount` **[Number][127]** The amount in tez to transfer for the initial balance
    -   `paramObject.code` **[String][123]** The code to deploy for the contract
    -   `paramObject.init` **[String][123]** The initial storage of the contract
    -   `paramObject.spendable` **[Boolean][124]** Whether the keyholder can spend the balance from the new account (optional, default `false`)
    -   `paramObject.delegatable` **[Boolean][124]** Whether the new account is delegatable (optional, default `false`)
    -   `paramObject.delegate` **[String][123]?** The delegate for the new account
    -   `paramObject.fee` **[Number][127]** The fee to set for the transaction (optional, default `1278`)
    -   `paramObject.gasLimit` **[Number][127]** The gas limit to set for the transaction (optional, default `10000`)
    -   `paramObject.storageLimit` **[Number][127]** The storage limit to set for the transaction (optional, default `257`)
-   `ledgerObject` **[Object][126]?** The ledger parameters for the operation (optional, default `{}`)
    -   `ledgerObject.useLedger` **[Boolean][124]** Whether to sign the transaction with a connected ledger device (optional, default `false`)
    -   `ledgerObject.path` **[String][123]** The ledger path (optional, default `44'/1729'/0'/0'`)
    -   `ledgerObject.curve` **[Number][127]** The value which defines the curve (0x00=tz1, 0x01=tz2, 0x02=tz3) (optional, default `0x00`)

Returns **[Promise][125]** Object containing the injected operation hash

### setDelegate

Set a delegate for an account

#### Parameters

-   `paramObject` **[Object][126]** The parameters for the operation
    -   `paramObject.from` **[Object][126]** The address sending the operation
    -   `paramObject.keys` **[Object][126]?** The keys for which to originate the account. If using a ledger, this is optional
    -   `paramObject.delegate` **[String][123]?** The delegate for the new account
    -   `paramObject.fee` **[Number][127]** The fee to set for the transaction (optional, default `1278`)
    -   `paramObject.gasLimit` **[Number][127]** The gas limit to set for the transaction (optional, default `10000`)
    -   `paramObject.storageLimit` **[Number][127]** The storage limit to set for the transaction (optional, default `0`)
-   `ledgerObject` **[Object][126]?** The ledger parameters for the operation (optional, default `{}`)
    -   `ledgerObject.useLedger` **[Boolean][124]** Whether to sign the transaction with a connected ledger device (optional, default `false`)
    -   `ledgerObject.path` **[String][123]** The ledger path (optional, default `44'/1729'/0'/0'`)
    -   `ledgerObject.curve` **[Number][127]** The value which defines the curve (0x00=tz1, 0x01=tz2, 0x02=tz3) (optional, default `0x00`)

Returns **[Promise][125]** Object containing the injected operation hash

### registerDelegate

Register an account as a delegate

#### Parameters

-   `paramObject` **[Object][126]** The parameters for the operation
    -   `paramObject.keys` **[Object][126]?** The keys for which to originate the account. If using a ledger, this is optional
    -   `paramObject.fee` **[Number][127]** The fee to set for the transaction (optional, default `1278`)
    -   `paramObject.gasLimit` **[Number][127]** The gas limit to set for the transaction (optional, default `10000`)
    -   `paramObject.storageLimit` **[Number][127]** The storage limit to set for the transaction (optional, default `0`)
-   `ledgerObject` **[Object][126]?** The ledger parameters for the operation (optional, default `{}`)
    -   `ledgerObject.useLedger` **[Boolean][124]** Whether to sign the transaction with a connected ledger device (optional, default `false`)
    -   `ledgerObject.path` **[String][123]** The ledger path (optional, default `44'/1729'/0'/0'`)
    -   `ledgerObject.curve` **[Number][127]** The value which defines the curve (0x00=tz1, 0x01=tz2, 0x02=tz3) (optional, default `0x00`)

Returns **[Promise][125]** Object containing the injected operation hash

### typecheckCode

Typechecks the provided code

#### Parameters

-   `code` **[String][123]** The code to typecheck

Returns **[Promise][125]** Typecheck result

### packData

Serializes a piece of data to a binary representation

#### Parameters

-   `data` **[String][123]** 
-   `type` **[String][123]** 

Returns **[Promise][125]** Serialized data

### typecheckData

Typechecks data against a type

#### Parameters

-   `data` **[String][123]** 
-   `type` **[String][123]** 

Returns **[Promise][125]** Typecheck result

### runCode

Runs or traces code against an input and storage

#### Parameters

-   `code` **[String][123]** Code to run
-   `amount` **[Number][127]** Amount to send
-   `input` **[String][123]** Input to run though code
-   `storage` **[String][123]** State of storage
-   `trace` **[Boolean][124]** Whether to trace (optional, default `false`)

Returns **[Promise][125]** Run results

## contract




### originate

Originate a new contract

#### Parameters

-   `paramObject` **[Object][126]** The parameters for the operation
    -   `paramObject.keys` **[Object][126]?** The keys for which to originate the account. If using a ledger, this is optional
    -   `paramObject.amount` **[Number][127]** The amount in tez to transfer for the initial balance
    -   `paramObject.code` **[String][123]** The code to deploy for the contract
    -   `paramObject.init` **[String][123]** The initial storage of the contract
    -   `paramObject.spendable` **[Boolean][124]** Whether the keyholder can spend the balance from the new account (optional, default `false`)
    -   `paramObject.delegatable` **[Boolean][124]** Whether the new account is delegatable (optional, default `false`)
    -   `paramObject.delegate` **[String][123]?** The delegate for the new account
    -   `paramObject.fee` **[Number][127]** The fee to set for the transaction (optional, default `1278`)
    -   `paramObject.gasLimit` **[Number][127]** The gas limit to set for the transaction (optional, default `10000`)
    -   `paramObject.storageLimit` **[Number][127]** The storage limit to set for the transaction (optional, default `10000`)
-   `ledgerObject` **[Object][126]?** The ledger parameters for the operation (optional, default `{}`)
    -   `ledgerObject.useLedger` **[Boolean][124]** Whether to sign the transaction with a connected ledger device (optional, default `false`)
    -   `ledgerObject.path` **[String][123]** The ledger path (optional, default `44'/1729'/0'/0'`)
    -   `ledgerObject.curve` **[Number][127]** The value which defines the curve (0x00=tz1, 0x01=tz2, 0x02=tz3) (optional, default `0x00`)

Returns **[Promise][125]** Object containing the injected operation hash

### storage

Get the current storage of a contract

#### Parameters

-   `contractAddress` **[String][123]** The address of the contract

Returns **[Promise][125]** The storage of the contract

### load

Get the contract at a given address

#### Parameters

-   `contractAddress` **[String][123]** The address of the contract

Returns **[Promise][125]** The contract

### watch

Watch a contract's storage based on a given interval

#### Parameters

-   `contractAddress` **[String][123]** The address of the contract
-   `timeout` **[Number][127]** The interval between checks in milliseconds
-   `callback` **requestCallback** The callback to fire when a change is detected

Returns **[Object][126]** The setInterval object

### send

Send to contract

#### Parameters

-   `paramObject` **[Object][126]** The parameters for the operation
    -   `paramObject.to` **[String][123]** The address of the recipient
    -   `paramObject.from` **[Object][126]** The address sending the operation
    -   `paramObject.keys` **[Object][126]?** The keys for which to originate the account. If using a ledger, this is optional
    -   `paramObject.amount` **[Number][127]** The amount in tez to transfer for the initial balance
    -   `paramObject.parameter` **[String][123]** The parameter for the transaction
    -   `paramObject.fee` **[Number][127]** The fee to set for the transaction (optional, default `1278`)
    -   `paramObject.gasLimit` **[Number][127]** The gas limit to set for the transaction (optional, default `400000`)
    -   `paramObject.storageLimit` **[Number][127]** The storage limit to set for the transaction (optional, default `60000`)
    -   `paramObject.mutez` **[Number][127]** Whether the input amount is set to mutez (1/1,000,000 tez) (optional, default `false`)
    -   `paramObject.rawParam` **[Number][127]** Whether to accept the object parameter format (optional, default `false`)
-   `ledgerObject` **[Object][126]?** The ledger parameters for the operation (optional, default `{}`)
    -   `ledgerObject.useLedger` **[Boolean][124]** Whether to sign the transaction with a connected ledger device (optional, default `false`)
    -   `ledgerObject.path` **[String][123]** The ledger path (optional, default `44'/1729'/0'/0'`)
    -   `ledgerObject.curve` **[Number][127]** The value which defines the curve (0x00=tz1, 0x01=tz2, 0x02=tz3) (optional, default `0x00`)

Returns **[Promise][125]** Object containing the injected operation hash

## crypto




### extractKeys

Extract key pairs from a secret key

#### Parameters

-   `sk` **[Object][126]** The secret key to extract key pairs from

Returns **[Promise][125]** The extracted key pairs

### generateMnemonic

Generate a mnemonic

Returns **[String][123]** The generated mnemonic

### checkAddress

Check the validity of a tezos implicit address (tz1...)

#### Parameters

-   `address` **[String][123]** The address to check

Returns **[Boolean][124]** Whether address is valid or not

### generateKeysNoSeed

Generate a new key pair without a seed

Returns **[Promise][125]** The generated key pair

### generateKeys

Generate a new key pair given a mnemonic and passphrase

#### Parameters

-   `mnemonic` **[String][123]** The mnemonic seed
-   `passphrase` **[String][123]** The passphrase used to encrypt the seed

Returns **[Promise][125]** The generated key pair

### generateKeysFromSeedMulti

Generate a new key pair given a mnemonic, passphrase, n

#### Parameters

-   `mnemonic` **[String][123]** The mnemonic seed
-   `passphrase` **[String][123]** The passphrase used to encrypt the seed
-   `n` **[Number][127]** 

Returns **[Promise][125]** The generated key pair

### sign

Sign bytes

#### Parameters

-   `bytes` **[String][123]** The bytes to sign
-   `sk` **[String][123]** The secret key to sign the bytes with
-   `wm` **[Object][126]** The watermark bytes

Returns **[Promise][125]** The signed bytes

### verify

Verify signed bytes

#### Parameters

-   `bytes` **[String][123]** The signed bytes
-   `sig` **[String][123]** The signature of the signed bytes
-   `pk` **[String][123]** The public key

Returns **[Boolean][124]** Whether the signed bytes are valid

## utility




### b582int

Convert from base58 to integer

#### Parameters

-   `v` **[Number][127]** The b58 value

Returns **[String][123]** The converted b58 value

### totez

Convert from mutez to tez

#### Parameters

-   `mutez` **[Number][127]** The amount in mutez to convert to tez

Returns **Integer** The mutez amount converted to tez

### mutez

Convert from tez to mutez

#### Parameters

-   `tez` **[Number][127]** The amount in tez to convert to mutez

Returns **[String][123]** The tez amount converted to mutez

### b58cencode

Base58 encode

#### Parameters

-   `payload` **[String][123]** The value to encode
-   `prefixArg` **[Object][126]** The Uint8Array prefix values

Returns **[String][123]** The base58 encoded value

### b58cdecode

Base58 decode

#### Parameters

-   `enc`  
-   `prefixArg` **[Object][126]** The Uint8Array prefix values
-   `payload` **[String][123]** The value to decode

Returns **[String][123]** The decoded base58 value

### buf2hex

Buffer to hex

#### Parameters

-   `buffer` **[Object][126]** The buffer to convert to hex

Returns **[String][123]** Converted hex value

### hex2buf

Hex to Buffer

#### Parameters

-   `hex` **[String][123]** The hex to convert to buffer

Returns **[Object][126]** Converted buffer value

### hexNonce

Generate a hex nonce

#### Parameters

-   `length` **[Number][127]** The length of the nonce

Returns **[String][123]** The nonce of the given length

### mergebuf

Merge two buffers together

#### Parameters

-   `b1` **[Object][126]** The first buffer
-   `b2` **[Object][126]** The second buffer

Returns **[Object][126]** The merged buffer

## tezos




### forge

Forge operation bytes

#### Parameters

-   `head` **[Object][126]** The current head of the chain
-   `opOb` **[Object][126]** The operation object(s)
-   `debug` **[Boolean][124]** Enable extra logging for debugging (optional, default `false`)

Returns **[String][123]** Forged operation bytes

### decodeRawBytes

Decode raw bytes

#### Parameters

-   `bytes` **[String][123]** The bytes to decode

Returns **[Object][126]** Decoded raw bytes

### encodeRawBytes

Encode raw bytes

#### Parameters

-   `input` **[Object][126]** The value to encode

Returns **[Object][126]** Encoded value as bytes

## forge




### toBytesInt32

#### Parameters

-   `num` **[Number][127]** Number to convert to bytes

Returns **[Object][126]** The converted number

### toBytesInt32Hex

#### Parameters

-   `num` **[Number][127]** Number to convert to hex

Returns **[String][123]** The converted number

Forge boolean

#### Parameters

-   `bool` **[Boolean][124]** Boolean value to convert

Returns **[String][123]** The converted boolean

#### Parameters

-   `script` **[Object][126]** Script to forge
    -   `script.code` **[Object][126]** Script code
    -   `script.storage` **[Object][126]** Script storage

Returns **[String][123]** Forged script bytes

-   `parameter` **[String][123]** Script to forge

Returns **[String][123]** Forged parameter bytes

#### Parameters

-   `pkh` **[String][123]** Public key hash to forge

Returns **[String][123]** Forged public key hash bytes

#### Parameters

-   `address` **[String][123]** Address to forge

Returns **[String][123]** Forged address bytes

#### Parameters

-   `n` **[Number][127]** Zarith to forge

Returns **[String][123]** Forged zarith bytes

### publicKey

#### Parameters

-   `pk` **[Number][127]** Public key to forge

Returns **[String][123]** Forged public key bytes

### op

Forge operation bytes

#### Parameters

-   `op` **[Number][127]** Operation to forge

Returns **[String][123]** Forged operation bytes

## ledger




### getAddress

Get the public key and public key hash from the ledger

#### Parameters

-   `ledgerParams` **[Object][126]** The parameters of the getAddress function (optional, default `{}`)
    -   `ledgerParams.path` **[string][123]** The ledger path (optional, default `44'/1729'/0'/0'`)
    -   `ledgerParams.displayConfirm` **[Boolean][124]** Whether to display a confirmation the ledger (optional, default `false`)
    -   `ledgerParams.curve` **[Number][127]** The value which defines the curve (0x00=tz1, 0x01=tz2, 0x02=tz3) (optional, default `0x00`)

Returns **[Promise][125]** The public key and public key hash

### signOperation

Sign an operation with the ledger

#### Parameters

-   `ledgerParams` **[Object][126]** The parameters of the signOperation function (optional, default `{}`)
    -   `ledgerParams.path` **[string][123]** The ledger path (optional, default `44'/1729'/0'/0'`)
    -   `ledgerParams.rawTxHex` **[Boolean][124]** The transaction hex for the ledger to sign
    -   `ledgerParams.curve` **[Number][127]** The value which defines the curve (0x00=tz1, 0x01=tz2, 0x02=tz3) (optional, default `0x00`)

Returns **[Promise][125]** The signed operation

### getVersion

Show the version of the ledger

Returns **[Promise][125]** The version info
